description: With a water-resistant nylon shell, 590 TurboDown™ insulation and an Omni-Heat™ thermal-reflective lining, this hooded jacket is the answer to chilly fall days and drizzly winter mornings.
name: Columbia Sportswear Voodoo Falls 590 TurboDown Hooded Jacket - Tall - Mens

specs.value: 100% nylon, 100% Polyester, 550 Fill Power Down Insulation, RDS Certified, Microtemp XF II 40g 100% polyester
